Youssef Francis (June 6, 1934 - April 14, 2001) bụ onye nduzi, onye edemede, na onye na-ese plastik, amụrụ na Cairo.

O nwetara nzere bachelọ nke Fine Arts na Ngalaba nke Photography na 1957, mgbe ahụ ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afọ abụọ n'ememe Luxor, diplọma nke Higher Institute of Cinema, mgbe ahụ ọ na-agụsị akwụkwọ na Ngalaba Directing na 1970, o nwekwara ọtụtụ mbiputa akwụkwọ na ngalaba dị iche iche.

Na mbido ọrụ ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe osise maka magazin "Rose Al-Youssef" na 1958 ruo otu afọ, mgbe ahụ ọ gara dee edemede ahụ na 1965 wee sonye na akwụkwọ akụkọ Al-Ahram na 1964, ọ rụkwara ọrụ n'ebe ahụ ruo mgbe ọ ruru ọkwa onye ndụmọdụ onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ, a họpụtara ya dịka onye nduzi nke Egyptian Cultural Center na 1987 na Paris.

Ihe nkiri mbụ ya, The Impossible na 1965 na ntinye aka nke Mustafa Mahmoud, na n'etiti ihe nkiri ya, My Father on the Tree na 1969, na ntinye aka Ihssan Abdel Quddous na Saad Eddin Wahba, na ihe nkiri The Thin Thread na 1971
Otu n'ime ọrụ telivishọn ya kachasị mkpa bụ miniseries nke 1980 nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Salah Zulfikar na-eme yana ihe nkiri ndị a na-eme na-eme.
Ọ lụrụ onye nta akụkọ Mona Siraj, osote onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ nke magazin Akhbar al-Nas, ma nwee ụmụ nwoke abụọ.
Ọ nwụrụ na Eprel 14, 2001, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri isii na asaa, n'ihi nkụchi obi nke dara ya n'obodo Hurghada dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri, ebe ọ na-etinye oge maka izu ike na ntụrụndụ.
